name: HMCharacteristicThresholdRangeEvent
desc: An event that triggers when the value of a characteristic is within a specified range.

items.name: init(characteristic: HMCharacteristic, thresholdRange: HMNumberRange)
items.desc: Creates a characteristic threshold range event for the specified characteristic and number range.

items.name: var characteristic: HMCharacteristic
items.desc: The characteristic associated with the event.

items.name: var thresholdRange: HMNumberRange
items.desc: The range of the characteristic value that triggers the event.
